content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. I am interested in renting my apartment for the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Based on my knowledge of the local market and the condition of the apartment, I would like to propose a price of 750 Euro per month. Is this acceptable to you, Mister Schmidt?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. How about 800 Euro per month? This is a fair price considering the location and the amenities nearby. Would you consider this offer?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Very well, Mister Schmidt. Would 850 Euro per month be more in line with your expectations? This would reflect a premium for the excellent location and the new construction.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your desire for a higher price, Mister Schmidt. Would 900 Euro per month be a price that you would consider? This would be a competitive rate for an apartment of this quality in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I respect your position. How about 950 Euro per month? This would be a generous offer that takes into account the value of the apartment and your asking price. Would you be willing to accept this?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
